E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Shawn Deckert
Dear Sir,
Shawn Deckert is doing pretty good at A Shalomar Scythes!
He has an ERA of 1.18, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Hans Mackenzie
Dear Sir,

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 8/2/1984
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Clair Clutter
